message.name: ERR_NO_LIABILITY_AMOUNT
message.locale: Outstanding Balance must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_RATE_SELECTED
message.locale: Either Recovery Rate fixed or Recovery Rate variable must be entered.

message.name: ERR_NO_PDC_SELECTED
message.locale: Please select at least one Product Delivery Case.

message.name: ERR_NO_START_DATE
message.locale: Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_NO_LIABILITY_TYPE
message.locale: Liability Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_NO_AMOUNT
message.locale: Outstanding Balance must be entered.

message.name: ERR_NEGATIVE_AMOUNT
message.locale: Outstanding Balance must be a positive amount.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVATE_ACTIVE_LBY
message.locale: Only inactive liabilities can be activated.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVATE_DELETED_LBY
message.locale: Deleted liabilities cannot be activated.

message.name: ERR_DEACTIVATE_INACTIVE_LBY
message.locale: Only active liabilities can be deactivated.

message.name: ERR_DEACTIVATE_DELETED_LBY
message.locale: Deleted liabilities cannot be deactivated.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_DELETED_LBY
message.locale: Liability is already in deleted status.

message.name: ERR_DELETED_LBY_WITH_DEDUCTIONS
message.locale: Liabilities with deductions applied cannot be deleted

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_DELETED_LBY
message.locale: Deleted liabilities cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_CONFIG
message.locale: There is an error with the third party associated with this deduction. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_NOMINEE
message.locale: There is an error with the case nominee on one of the cases you have selected. Please make sure that this individual is an active case nominee on all the selected cases.

message.name: ERR_NO_DEDUCTIONS_EXISTING
message.locale: There were no deductions priorly associated with this external liability. Please create a new external liability instead.

message.name: ERR_DOJ_DEDUCTION_EXISTS
message.locale: A DOJ Liability of the same type exists.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TOWRITEOFF_OUTSTANDINGBAL
message.locale: Unable to write-off outstanding balance. Please contact administrator.

message.name: ERR_UNALLOCATED_DEDUCTIONS_EXISTS
message.locale: There exists some unallocated deductions and cannot delete the liability until the deductions are fully allocated.
